column1: do ppl comparing it to the flu realize there’s a flu vaccine so it’s not as harmful for us whereas there’s no vaccine to prevent coronavirus. and because it’s a ‘virus’ it’s purely down to the immune system to be strong enough to recover as no antibiotics or anything can help it
